text: Vadim Yuryevich Logunov (; born 2 March 1968) is a former Russian football player. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:FC Metallurg Lipetsk players Category:FC APK Morozovsk players Category:Soviet footballers Category:Russian footballers Category:FC Krystal Kherson players Category:Russian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Ukraine Category:FC Lokomotiv Nizhny Novgorod players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:Association football forwards Category:Association football midfielders
title: Vadim Logunov
